content.rendered:
We discover, develop, and deliver life-changing therapies by harnessing cutting-edge science to create new possibilities for people with serious diseases that have high unmet need.

View Career Opportunities

Improving lives is the foundation of all that we do

Scholar Rock’s deep-seated spirit of curiosity and ingenuity originates in our science but extends to everything we do. We respect each other’s expertise and value all voices because by working together with trust and respect, we can achieve extraordinary results for patients.

“I am happy to be among such a driven and smart group of people who want to be here and work together.”

Mania Kavosi
Principal Associate Scientist, BioAnalytical & Translational Technologies Group

Values  

Improving lives is the foundation of our values and our ultimate endpoint. To drive the best outcomes for patients and families, we at Scholar Rock:

Focus on the Patient
We champion what matters to patients and their families.

Cultivate Curiosity
Passion for science is our pathway to excellence, allowing thoughtful questions to drive daring ideas.

Collaborate With Purpose
We are greater than the sum of our parts. By working together with trust and respect, we can achieve extraordinary results.

Uphold High Standards
We strive for excellence by acting with integrity, delivering high quality, and operating with accountability in our work and with each other.

Accelerate Breakthroughs
There is no time to waste. We are determined to discover, develop and deliver new possibilities for patients.

What’s in a Name?

For centuries, scholar rocks have been collected in China for their unusual patterns of erosion and wear, which are believed to reveal inner strength and truth. This capacity of scholar rocks to elicit deep insight and their visual similarity to protein structures reflect our quest to discover breakthrough medicines for patients.

Leadership

Management Team

Our diverse and extensive backgrounds establishing and leading biotechnology companies combined with our patient-first foresight help us lead Scholar Rock to develop life-changing therapies.

Meet Our Management Team

Board of Directors

Our robust group of C-Suite executives and leaders from current and former biopharmaceutical companies and leaders from highly esteemed institutions meet the interests of internal and external stakeholders, all for the benefit of patients.

 Meet Our Board of Directors

Partnerships

Help us shed light on the subject. Collaborate with us to uncover enlightened solutions for patients.

Learn More About Partnerships

“We want people who say ‘throw it at me!’ when new things come their way.”

Samantha “Sam” Nicholls
Associate Director of Protein Sciences

Join Our Team

View Career Opportunities
